wcslen.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_WCSLEN_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_WCSLEN_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // wcslen.hpp:
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 #include <cstddef> // size_t
00020 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00021 #if defined(BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)
00022 namespace std{ 
00023     using ::size_t; 
00024 } // namespace std
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 #ifndef BOOST_NO_CWCHAR
00028 
00029 // a couple of libraries which include wchar_t don't include
00030 // wcslen
00031 
00032 #if defined(BOOST_DINKUMWARE_STDLIB) && BOOST_DINKUMWARE_STDLIB < 306 \
00033 || defined(__LIBCOMO__) 
00034 
00035 namespace std {
00036 inline std::size_t wcslen(const wchar_t * ws)
00037 {
00038     const wchar_t * eows = ws;
00039     while(* eows != 0)
00040         ++eows;
00041     return eows - ws;
00042 }
00043 } // namespace std
00044 
00045 #else
00046 
00047 #include <cwchar>
00048 #ifdef BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE
00049 namespace std{ using ::wcslen; }
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 #endif // wcslen
00053 
00054 #endif //BOOST_NO_CWCHAR
00055 
00056 #endif //BOOST_ARCHIVE_WCSLEN_HPP
